docs.text:
Welcome


Hello There!


This documentation provides information on how to connect to SPLENDID RESEARCH via API.

It aims to include both general and technical principles and processes.

By following the steps described below you will be able to gain access to our Online Access Panels.


Do not hesitate to 
contact us
 if you are having any questions or remarks about this documentation.


Integration Process


Connecting to our panels is very easy! You just need to consider and implement 4 methods:






Panelist Transfer

You need to gain access to our panelbase to be able to target and select panelists.






Invite Requests

You can request new invitations via API.






Status

Every participant who finishes a survey should get a final status which will be transmitted to us.






Redirects

After finishing a survey the panelist should be redirected to us again depending on the status he got.






Workflow Chart


As you see there is really not much needed to get the API to work:




Other Integrations


Your API approach looks different from what is described above?

No problem! Feel free to 
contact us
 and we'll try to find a way to collaborate.

By following the steps described below you will be able to gain access to our Online Access Panels.  Do not hesitate to  contact us  if you are having any questions or remarks about this documentation.

After finishing a survey the panelist should be redirected to us again depending on the status he got.

docs.title: Other Integrations

docs.text:
Explanation


After a survey has been finished by a panelist, we need to be informed about the status he/she has accomplished in order to be able to credit the incentive.

This can be done easily via API as well. There are different types of status which should be distinguished.


Types of Status


Complete

The panelist was able to complete the survey successfully and will be credited by us.

Each complete will be invoiced according to our agreement.


Screenout

The panelist did not qualify for the survey since he/she does not belong to the target group(s).

Screening questions should be asked at the beginning of the survey.


Quotafull

The panelist did qualify for the survey, however there were already enough completes registered of the panelists group quota.


Transmission


The status information should be sent to us via POST to an individual URL which you will be provided with and should contain the following information:


IMPORTANT: The URL for status transmission is different to the URL for invite requests.








Variable


Explanation










status


Values: COMPLETE, SCREENOUT, QUOTAFULL






loi


Length of interview in minutes






project_id


ID of project/survey






country_iso_code


Country ISO Code of project/survey






language


Language of survey






respondent_id


ID of panelist








Example


{
    "status":"COMPLETE",
    "loi":"15",
    "project_id":"12345",
    "country_iso_code":"US",
    "language":"en",
    "respondent_id":"349-1-12345678"
}
docs.title: Status

Variable  Explanation      status  Values: COMPLETE, SCREENOUT, QUOTAFULL    loi  Length of interview in minutes    project_id  ID of project/survey    country_iso_code  Country ISO Code of project/survey    language  Language of survey    respondent_id  ID of panelist
docs.title: Transmission

docs.text:
Explanation


After a survey has been finished by a panelist, he/she should be redirected to us again where we will inform him about his status and provide additional information.

Depending on the status a different page will be shown to the panelist.

You should implement those URLs as redirects after a survey has been finished.


IMPORTANT: Those redirects do not affect the status. Both the redirect and the status should be the same, however both methods have to be implemented separately.


URLs


Please implement the following redirects:


Complete


https://surveys.mobrog.com/?ID=43&return=complete


Screenout


https://surveys.mobrog.com/?ID=43&return=screenout


Quotafull


https://surveys.mobrog.com/?ID=43&return=quotafull
docs.title: Redirects

docs.text:

docs.title: URLs

docs.text:
This documentation provides information on how to develop an API to the online access panels of SPLENDID RESEARCH for Market Research purpose.


Please contact 
Jan Fischer
 for any questions relating SPLENDID RESEARCH, API integration or this documentation.


SPLENDID RESEARCH GmbH

Barmbeker Str. 7a

22303 Hamburg

Germany


Phone: +49 40/69 45 366-77

api@splendid-research.com
